downloadTitle: Security Update for Microsoft Forefront Protection 2010 for Exchange Server (2927022)
downloadDescription: Applies to systems running Microsoft Forefront Protection 2010 for Exchange Server version 11.0.727.0
detailsSection:
This security update resolves a privately reported vulnerability in Microsoft Forefront. The vulnerability could allow remote code execution if a specially crafted email message is scanned.
This security update is rated Critical for all supported builds of Microsoft Forefront Protection for Exchange 2010.
systemRequirementsSection: Microsoft Forefront Protection 2010 for Exchange Server version 11.0.727.0, also known as Hotfix Rollup 4 for Microsoft Forefront Protection for Exchange
installInstructionSection:
To start the download, click the Download button. 
•   Click Run to start the installation immediately.
•   Click Save to copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time.
